document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Sic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">transit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">gloria </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">mundi </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">doth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">busy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">bee" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Dum </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">vivamus </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">vivamus </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">stay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">enemy! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">veni </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">vidi </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">vici! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">caput </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">cap-a-pie! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">"memento </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">mori" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Hurrah </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Peter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Parley </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Hurrah </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Daniel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Boone </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Three </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">cheers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">sir, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">gentleman </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">observed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">moon </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Peter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">up </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">sunshine! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Pattie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">arrange </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">stars </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Luna, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">tea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">waiting </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">call </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">brother </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Mars </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">apple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Adam </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shal't </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">pippin </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">off </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Father's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">tree! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">climb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">"Hill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Science" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">"view </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Landscape </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">o'er" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">transcendental </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">prospect </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ne'er </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">beheld </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Legislature </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">country </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">bids </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">india </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">rubbers </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">case </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">wind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">blow. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">During </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">education </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">announced </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">gravitation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">stumbling </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Fell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">apple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">tree </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Earth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">axis </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">supposed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">turn </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">gymnastic </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">honor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">brave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Columbus </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">sailing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">o'er </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">tide </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">notified </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">nations </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">reside </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Mortality </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">fatal </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Gentility </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">fine </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Rascality, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">heroic </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Insolvency, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">sublime </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Fathers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">being </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">weary </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Laid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Bunker </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Hill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">full </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">morn'g </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">sleeping </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">trumpet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">sir, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">wake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">streams </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">rise </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Each </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">solemn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">musket </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">marching </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">skies! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">coward </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">remain, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Sir, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">fight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">immortal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">hero </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">hat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">run. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">bye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Sir, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">going </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">country </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">calleth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Allow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Sir, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">parting </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">wipe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">weeping </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">e'e </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">token </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">friendship </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Accept </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">"Bonnie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Doon" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">hand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">pluck'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Hath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">passed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">beyond </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">moon </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">memory </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">ashes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">consolation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">farewell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Tuscarora </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">farewell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Sir, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Sic transit gloria mundi
